transcripts.text: This is Terry Swoop of Swoop's Entertainment Vids.  In today's video, we're gonna take a look at legendary rapper Tupac Shakur.  Tupac Shakur was born in 1971. But Billy Garland wasn't there when he was growing up.  He didn't appear until Tupac became an adult.  Now Tupac grew up in poverty.  He grew up in the worst type of poverty.  And throughout the 1980s, his family moved to Baltimore.  In the 1980s, Baltimore was one of the most violent cities in America.  And it's still one of the most violent cities in America.
